settings.aboutContent:
ClearCue v1.0.0

A simple, private, and effective reminder app designed to help you stay organized without the clutter.

‚ú® Features:
‚Ä¢ Smart notifications
‚Ä¢ Calendar integration
‚Ä¢ Priority management
‚Ä¢ Family sharing
‚Ä¢ No ads or tracking

Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for productivity
settings.privacyContent:
üîí Your Privacy Matters

ClearCue is built with privacy-first principles:

üì± Local Storage:
‚Ä¢ Reminders stored locally on your device
‚Ä¢ No cloud sync unless you choose Firebase
‚Ä¢ Your data stays private

‚òÅÔ∏è Firebase Sync (Optional):
‚Ä¢ End-to-end encrypted when enabled
‚Ä¢ Only you can access your data
‚Ä¢ No data mining or tracking

üö´ No Tracking:
‚Ä¢ No analytics or user profiling
‚Ä¢ No third-party data sharing
‚Ä¢ No targeted advertising

üìã Data Control:
‚Ä¢ Export your data anytime
‚Ä¢ Delete all data permanently
‚Ä¢ Complete control over your information

Your reminders, your privacy, your control.
